mng: to do, to grow, to write or compose, to pretend, to regard as, to feel, writings or works

exm.mng: to cooperate, to collaborate, to work together, cooperation
to write, literary work, book, article, writings
one's conduct, deed, activity, accomplishment, achievement, to act as, as (in the capacity of), qua, to view as, to look upon (sth as), to take sth to be
to work, (of a machine) to operate, job, work, task
to work, to operate, to manipulate
to act on, to affect, action, function, activity, impact, result, effect, purpose, intent, to play a role, corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization
